Sonarr/Sonarr

automates TV show downloads and organizes episodes for usenet and bittorrent users

View on index

Related repos

  • proxy for torrent indexers, connects apps like Sonarr and Radarr
  • Automates movie downloads, sorting, and upgrades for your collection
  • syncs Plex watchlists with Sonarr and Radarr for automated media downloads
  • Organizes media libraries without Sonarr or Radarr
  • Cleans failed downloads for Sonarr and Radarr
  • Self-hosted torrent tracker and site framework, built with Rust and Vue
  • automates fixing media issues in Jellyseerr using Sonarr and Radarr webhooks
  • private BitTorrent tracker generator for sharing files with friends
